articles.description: Donald Trump is courting Black voters and a conservative group popular with white supremacists during back-to-back stops in Michigan. The former president hosted a Saturday afternoon roundtable discussion at an African American church in Detroit and delivered…
articles.content: DETROIT (AP) Donald Trump used back-to-back stops Saturday to court Black voters and a conservative group that has been accused of attracting white supremacists as the Republican presidential candida… [+7427 chars]

articles.title: Female partners could save them: Plants which outlasted dinosaurs may get extinct; scientists are trying to find a match | Today News - Mint
articles.description: Encephalartos woodii (E. woodii) is a plant from South Africa living on the verge of extinction because of the absence of female plants
